00080   public function __construct( array $options, $readOnly = true )
00081   {
00082     $this->_readOnly = $readOnly;
00083     $this->_iterationIndex = 0;
00084     $this->_options = array();
00085     
00086     foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00087     {
00088       if ( is_array( $_value ) )
00089         $this->_options[$_key] = new self( $_value, $readOnly );
00090       else
00091         $this->_options[$_key] = $_value;
00092     }
00093

00133   public function merge( CXLConfig $mergeConfig )
00134   {
00135     foreach ( $mergeConfig as $_key => $_option )
00136     {
00137       if ( array_key_exists( $_key, $this->_options ) )
00138       {
00139         if ( $_option instanceof CXLConfig && $this->{$_key} instanceof CXLConfig )
00140           $this->{$_key} = $this->{$_key}->merge( new CXLConfig( $_option->toArray(), $this->_readOnly ) );
00141         else
00142           $this->{$_key} = $_option;
00143       }
00144       else
00145       {
00146         if ( $_option instanceof CXLConfig )
00147           $this->$_key = new CXLConfig( $_option->toArray(), $this->_readOnly );
00148         else
00149           $this->$_key = $_option;
00150       }
00151     }
00152 
00153     return $this;

00299       return parent::__set( $key, $value );

00301     if ( $this->_readOnly )
00302     {
00303       throw new CXLReadOnlyException(

00361   public function __unset( $key )
00362   {
00363     if ( $this->_readOnly )
00364     {
00365       throw new CXLReadOnlyException(
00366         XL::t(
00367           self::CLASS_LOG_TAG,
00368           'Property "{class}.{property}" is read only.',
00369           array(
00370             '{class}' => get_class( $this ),
00371             '{property}' => $key,
00372           )
00373         )
00374       );
00375     }
00376       
00377     XL::uo( $this->_options, $key );
00378     $this->_optionCount = count( $this->_options );
00379     $this->_skipNext = true;
00380     
00381     //  Never break the chain
00382     return $this;
00383   }
